summary: This document is an email forwarding a New York Times article about Prince Andrew's interview regarding his association with Jeffrey Epstein. The article discusses Prince Andrew's admission that staying with Epstein was a mistake and his attempt to distance himself from the scandal.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.role: British Royal, Associate of Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded New York Times article; he admits in an interview that staying with Jeffrey Epstein was a mistake and that he 'let the side down'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The financier with whom Prince Andrew stayed; his association with Prince Andrew is the central topic of the article.

connections.description: Prince Andrew stayed with Jeffrey Epstein, an association he later publicly regretted.

events.title: New York Times publishes Prince Andrew interview
events.description: The New York Times publishes an article featuring an interview with Prince Andrew where he discusses his association with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Email forwarding article
events.description: An email is sent forwarding the New York Times article about Prince Andrew's interview.

keyFacts: Prince Andrew publicly stated he 'let the side down' by staying with Jeffrey Epstein.
The statement was made in a New York Times interview published on November 15, 2019.
The document is an email forwarding this news article, indicating internal circulation of the story.
